curam.util.workflow.impl
Class TaskAdmin

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.workflow.base.TaskAdmin
      curam.util.workflow.impl.TaskAdmin
All Implemented Interfaces:
curam.util.workflow.intf.TaskAdmin
public abstract class TaskAdmin
extends curam.util.workflow.base.TaskAdmin

The Task entity stores details of a set of instructions to enable a user to perform the manual work required by an activity in a workflow. This API provides functions to manipulate the data on the Task and its functions should be used rather than direct access to the functions present on the actual entity.

read

public TaskInfo read(long taskID)
              throws AppException,
                     InformationalException
Returns the details of the specified task.

Parameters:
taskID - The unique identifier of a task.
Returns:
The details of the specified task.
Throws:
AppException - ID_TASK_DOES_NOT_EXIST - if a task with specified identifier does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

modify

public void modify(long taskID,
                   java.lang.String administrationSID,
                   boolean allowForwardInd,
                   DateTime assignedDateTime,
                   java.lang.String category,
                   DateTime creationTime,
                   boolean deadTimeOverInd,
                   boolean overflowInd,
                   java.lang.String priority,
                   java.lang.String reservedBy,
                   DateTime restartTime,
                   java.lang.String status,
                   int totalTimeWorked,
                   java.lang.String wdoSnapshot,
                   int versionNo)
            throws AppException,
                   InformationalException
Modifies all of the details of the specified task.

Parameters:
taskID - The unique identifier associated with a task.
administrationSID - The administration security identifier associated with a manual activity.
allowForwardInd - A boolean flag to indicate if the task can be forwarded.
assignedDateTime - The date and time at which the task was assigned.
category - The category of the activity associated with this task.
creationTime - The date and time at which the task was created.
deadTimeOverInd - A boolean flag to indicate if the time associated with a deadline may be overridden.
overflowInd - A boolean flag that indicates if the WDO snapshot XML string requires access to the TaskWDOOverflow overflow table.
priority - The priority of the task.
reservedBy - The name of the user that has reserved the task.
restartTime - The date and time at which the task was restarted.
status - The status of the task.
totalTimeWorked - The total time spent on this task (in seconds).
wdoSnapshot - A snapshot of the WDO data mapped to the parameters of the task subject and actions taken when a task record is created.
versionNo - The optimistic locking version number.
Throws:
AppException - Exceptions that may occur when modifying a task.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

listReserved

public TaskFullDetails listReserved(java.lang.String userName,
                                    java.lang.String category,
                                    int maxListSize,
                                    boolean includeSubject)
                             throws AppException,
                                    InformationalException
Returns the the details of all of the reserved tasks for a user associated with a specified category. The tasks will be ordered by deadline date time, earliest first. Information about the requested and actual number of tasks is also returned.

Parameters:
userName - The name of the user whose reserved tasks will be returned.
category - The activity category associated with the task.
maxListSize - The maximum number of task details to be returned.
includeSubject - If specified to true, the subject of the task will be returned in the results.
Returns:
The details of the reserved tasks.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

listReserved

public TaskFullDetails listReserved(java.lang.String userName,
                                    int maxListSize,
                                    java.lang.String status,
                                    boolean includeSubject)
                             throws AppException,
                                    InformationalException
Returns the details of all of the reserved tasks for a user that contain a particular status. If status is not specified it will default to NOT STARTED. The tasks will be ordered by deadline date time, earliest first. Information about the requested and actual number of tasks is also returned.

Parameters:
userName - The name of the user whose reserved tasks will be returned.
status - The status of a task.
includeSubject - If specified to true, the subject of the task will be returned in the results.
maxListSize - The maximum number of task details to be returned.
Returns:
Reserved tasks for a user that contain a particular status. The tasks will be ordered by deadline.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

listReserved

public TaskFullDetails listReserved(java.lang.String userName,
                                    long bizObjectID,
                                    java.lang.String bizObjectType,
                                    java.lang.String status,
                                    int maxListSize,
                                    boolean includeSubject)
                             throws AppException,
                                    InformationalException
Returns the details of all of the reserved tasks for a user associated with a specified business object type and identifier. If the task status is not specified it will default to NOT STARTED. The tasks will be ordered by deadline date time, earliest first. Information about the requested and actual number of tasks is also returned.

Parameters:
userName - The name of the user reserving the task.
bizObjectID - Identifies a particular instance of the specified business object type.
bizObjectType - Specifies the business object type.
status - The status of a task.
maxListSize - The maximum number of task details to be returned.
includeSubject - If specified to true, the subject of the task will be returned in the results.
Returns:
A list of the details for all of the reserved tasks associated with a specified business object type and identifier. The tasks will be ordered by deadline date time, earliest first.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

listReserved

public TaskFullDetails listReserved(java.lang.String userName,
                                    long bizObjectID,
                                    java.lang.String bizObjectType,
                                    java.lang.String status,
                                    DateTime fromDateTime,
                                    DateTime toDateTime,
                                    int maxListSize,
                                    boolean includeSubject)
                             throws AppException,
                                    InformationalException
Returns the details of all of the reserved tasks for a user associated with a specified business object type and identifier and due within the specified date range. If the task status is not specified it will default to NOT STARTED. The tasks will be ordered by deadline date time, earliest first. Information about the requested and actual number of tasks is also returned.

Parameters:
userName - The name of the user reserving the task.
bizObjectID - A particular instance of the specified business object type.
bizObjectType - The business object type.
status - The status of a task.
fromDateTime - The task search from date required (inclusive).
toDateTime - The task search to date required (exclusive).
maxListSize - The maximum number of task details to be returned.
includeSubject - If specified to true, the subject of the task will be returned in the results.
Returns:
A list of the details of all of the reserved tasks associated with a specified user, status, business object type and identifier and due within the specified date range. The tasks will be ordered by deadline date time, earliest first.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

                                    DateTime fromDateTime,
                                    DateTime toDateTime,
                                    int maxListSize,
                                    boolean includeSubject)
                             throws AppException,
                                    InformationalException

fromDateTime - The task search from date required (inclusive).
toDateTime - The task search to date required (exclusive).
maxListSize - The maximum number of task details to be returned.
includeSubject - If specified to true, the subject of the task will be returned in the results.
Returns:
A list of the task details for all of the reserved tasks associated with a specified user, business object type and identifier and due within the specified date range. The tasks will be ordered by deadline date time, earliest first.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.

listAll

public TaskFullDetails listAll(long bizObjectID,
                               java.lang.String bizObjectType,
                               int maxListSize,
                               boolean includeSubject)
                        throws AppException,
                               InformationalException
Returns the details of both the reserved and assigned tasks associated with a specified business object type and identifier. Tasks with a status of CLOSED will be excluded from the result. The tasks will be ordered by deadline date time, earliest first. Information about the requested and actual number of tasks is also returned.

Parameters:
bizObjectID - The identifier of a particular instance of the specified business object type.
bizObjectType - The business object type.
maxListSize - The maximum number of task details to be returned.
includeSubject - If specified to true, the subject of the task will be returned in the results.
Returns:
A list of the details of both the assigned and reserved tasks associated with a specified business object type and identifier. The tasks will be ordered by deadline date time, earliest first.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

listAll

public TaskFullDetails listAll(long bizObjectID,
                               java.lang.String bizObjectType,
                               DateTime fromDateTime,
                               DateTime toDateTime,
                               int maxListSize,
                               boolean includeSubject)
                        throws AppException,
                               InformationalException
Returns the details of both the assigned and reserved tasks associated with a specified business object type and identifier and due within the supplied date range. Tasks with a status of CLOSED will be excluded. The tasks will be ordered by deadline date time, earliest first. Information about the requested and actual number of tasks is also returned.

Parameters:
bizObjectID - The identifier of a particular instance of the specified business object type.
bizObjectType - The business object type.
fromDateTime - The from due date.
toDateTime - The to due date.
maxListSize - The maximum number of task details to be returned.
includeSubject - If specified to true, the subject of the task will be returned in the results.
Returns:
A list of the details for both the reserved and assigned tasks associated with a specified business object type and identifier and due within the specified date range. The tasks will be ordered by deadline date time, earliest first.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
